verbs.description: In recent days , President Trump [V: has] asked advisers about his ability to pardon family and even himself . But can he ?
[ARGM-TMP: In recent days] , [ARG0: President Trump] has [V: asked] [ARG2: advisers] [ARG1: about his ability to pardon family and even himself] . But can he ?
In recent days , President Trump has asked advisers about his ability to [V: pardon] [ARG1: family and even himself] . But can he ?
In recent days , President Trump has asked advisers about his ability to pardon family and even himself . But [V: can] he ?
